response.original_title: Nuclear Fuel Waste Research: The Canadian Program
response.overview: The Canadian program for nuclear fuel waste management is explained through interviews with people working inside and outside the nuclear industry and by a visit to the Whiteshell Nuclear Research Establishment, where a long-range used-fuel disposal program is being developed. Revised version from the film Nuclear Fuel Waste Management (106C 0179 542).  Produced for the NFB by Crawley Films Ltd. for Atomic Energy Canada, Whiteshell Nuclear Research Establishment.
response.title: Nuclear Fuel Waste Research: The Canadian Program

titles.title: Programme canadien de recherches sur l'évacuation des déchets de combustible nucléaire
